summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy mountainous environment. A character wielding a flaming sword is engaged in combat with an enemy named Kang Jin Star, as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The enemy is positioned near a large, ornate structure wedged between two rocky cliffs, surrounded by glowing blue orbs. The user interface includes various icons on the left and right sides, likely representing abilities or items available to the player. Text at the bottom of the screen reads, "Now that my persuasion failed, you'll go back to the pagoda and be remade," suggesting a narrative element or dialogue.
